channel.title: Ole Michelsen Latest Updates
channel.copyright: Copyright 2005- by Ole Michelsen. All rights reserved.

item.title: Regex Crossword
item.description: Created a new puzzle game called Regex Crossword

item.title: Portfolio redesign
item.description: Did a design reboot of my Portfolio and added my latest projects

item.title: HTML5 animations
item.description: Having some fun with CSS3 transformations and HTML5 audio - compatible with both Chrome, Safari and Firefox.

item.title: World Travel Map
item.description: Created a photo map of all the places I have visited around the world.

item.title: Launching a new range of tools
item.description: Created new tools for regular expressions testing, Base64 encoding and HTML batch validation.

item.title: Script Minifier
item.description: Added a tool which interfaces both the YUI and Microsoft AJAX CSS/JS minifiers.

item.title: URI encoding and decoding
item.description: Wrote a short piece about the use of encodeURIComponent() and the mistakingly used escape() function - accompanied of course by a tool for testing :-)

item.title: Website optimization techniques
item.description: Wrote an article about website optimization techniques and how I have applied them to this site.

item.title: New layout and content!
item.description: Just updated this site with my current projects and a major design refresh, now featuring HTML5 and CSS3. Look here for my recent work.

item.title: Nice approach to a crucial problem
item.description: Linkback to the CSS3 PIE project, which is bringing CSS3 to IE6, 7 and 8.

item.title: Added some nice new shots from Berlin and Malaysia.
item.description: My Photo page has been updated, and the slideshow is displaying some of my newest snapshots.
